meanings.definition: The outer shell of a vehicle, including the frame and panels.
meanings.sent1: The autobody of the car was dented in the accident.
meanings.sent2: The autobody of the truck was painted a shiny red color.
meanings.sent3: The autobody of the old car looked like a giant metal shell.
meanings.sent4: The autobody of the bus was a protective armor on wheels.
meanings.sent5: The autobody of the vehicle gleamed under the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A shop where repairs are made to the body of a vehicle.
meanings.sent1: The autobody fixed the scratches on my car door.
meanings.sent2: I took my car to the autobody for a paint job.
meanings.sent3: The autobody was so busy that they had to work overtime.
meanings.sent4: The autobody was like a hospital for wounded cars.
meanings.sent5: The autobody transformed my vehicle into a brand new ride.
